website_summaries.verdict: A top-selling product by a trusted brand that has been protecting babies against diaper rash for generations.
pros: Helps prevent, heal, and soothe rash with fragrance-free zinc oxide formula
cons: Some consumers received jars that were somewhat dry and difficult to apply
Jar's lack of a protective seal is concerning

customer_reviews.title: Works well for skin problems for people who are  bed bound
customer_reviews.text: My wife's care givers say that this is the BEST THING for skin problems for the bed bound. People who are in bed most of the time can develop skin breakdown, and unless you take care of it, it can lead to hospitalization. My wife has been using it for many years and when her caregivers till me to order it, I know I need to order it. And when I order it, it ARRIVED THE NEXT DAY with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: D. at LLRC

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE DELIVERY SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: Its a good quality product... but the delivery service was HORRIBLE!!! The packages of the product came open and spread all over the box. I'm disappointed, because I lost a good part of the cream. I hope at least be rewarded. Picture attached.
customer_reviews.author: DINAH LINS GALVAO MOREIRA

customer_reviews.title: Not the same since it replaced Rapid Relief
customer_reviews.text: This used to be called Rapid Relief and the product was MUCH thicker, with better staying power. That’s what 99% of these reviews are referring to. However, a few months ago they replaced it with Daily Defense, in the same packaging just with a different name. This product is different, it’s much thinner and sort of splatters everywhere when you use it. Not nearly as good as rapid relief. Too bad, I just cancelled my Subscribe & Save because I found the old Rapid Relief at a drugstore, although I assume eventually that too will be swapped out.
customer_reviews.author: Laura D.

customer_reviews.title: Best Rash Cream!
customer_reviews.text: Desitin is the only brad of diaper rash cream that really works for my son. I am glad I can get a big jar on Amazon for a great price. The jar lasts a lot longer than the tubes and overall I just like it more. The only thing I do not like about Desitin is the smell. Maybe some people don't mind it, but after using it for awhile, I wish it smelled better. It also seems to linger so I'm constantly smelling it! lol. I'm thankful this product works and if it smelled better I'd give it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Tana

customer_reviews.title: Made my baby's rash worse and dried out her skin.
customer_reviews.text: Dried out our newborn's skin when we first started using it. Thought it was because our baby didn't have diaper rash Desitin didn't work, so we stopped using it and switched to A&D instead. Our baby now has diaper rash so I decided to give this product another try. At the first diaper change she started howling in pain which didn't happen with A&D. Desitin didn't provide her any relief and instead made her rash worse. Not happy with this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: GenX

customer_reviews.title: Very good and works well for rashes.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works so well on diaper rash. The extra strength works better, but is so thick. This is a really good balance of healing and thin enough to spread where needed. I like the big tub so i can dip in a finger without having to squeeze a tube. We keep this right next to the wipes for easy access.
customer_reviews.author: Liz S

customer_reviews.title: Its my favorite diaper cream
customer_reviews.text: Its my favorite diaper cream, I am using only this cream since my baby is born, this big one is better, its stays for longer time. no need to buy again and again. Yes it leaves the stains but we don't applied cream below the cloths its below the diaper so be careful while application you will not get any stains. overall its a good cream, its treats diaper rashes very quickly and if you applied everyday, then you will not see any diaper rash really.
customer_reviews.author: Ajay Singh

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This works great when I start to see a diaper rash so it quickly is stopped before it gets bad. One application at night and by morning it's looking better. If I don't catch the rash early then I let my toddler do naked time which is the quickest and easiest way to get rid of the rash and I apply this whenever she has a diaper on. Within a day a bad rash is almost resolved. Air is the absolute best but this is great for prevention and early action. I love that this is easy to apply and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I like the light blue cream because it's not as thick ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the light blue cream because it's not as thick as the other I used to use before..only one problem,.my baby doesn't like the feeling of it. He never cied with the other one like he does with this.every single time I change his diaper, he playd and giggles during cleaning until I put the cream on him..and that's where all the fun starts by pushing himself up as ig he's trying to get away from it 😂😂 Other than that it's a good product and I love it ☺
customer_reviews.author: Bella B. M.

customer_reviews.title: A good deal that worked for us
customer_reviews.text: This was great to help keep my elderly mom's skin from breaking down. It's a good bargain way of buying it as I really try to look for good prices. Any time I saw red or pink on her I would give a nice coating of this Desitin and it seemed to protect her well.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Buy the Maximum Strength.
customer_reviews.text: I recommend buying the maximum strength of this product. You will notice that you need to use less and it doesn't go bad. By that I mean water starts to separate from the product.
customer_reviews.author: 1911dsstrp45

customer_reviews.title: Works as preventative and for healing! Trust this brand.
customer_reviews.text: Loyal to this product. Been using it since day one and will continue to use it. Helps to prevent and clear rashes in hours. My baby’s skin has been super sensible and I had to even switch wipes several times because many of them would irritate him. That’s how bad it is. This is the only baby diaper rash cream that works for him for both as preventative and healing.
customer_reviews.author: Rise G.

customer_reviews.title: Works but super messy
customer_reviews.text: While this stuff works pretty well it is soooo messy! Much more viscous than others I am used to (balmex, triple cream). My busy 17 month old guy always finds a way to get it everywhere (all over the walls!) when I'm putting it on him, no matter how careful I am. Much less expensive but I don't think I'll buy again due to all the mess.
customer_reviews.author: KTOde

customer_reviews.title: broken safety seal and dirty container
customer_reviews.text: I recieved my order of Desitin cream today. The amazon shipment packaging was intact and undamaged. The product itself was dirty: the bottom has some kind of black oil substance on it and the lid and sides have a sticky dirty substance on them and the safety seal had already been broken. I do not feel safe using this. Hate I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: The seal is broken
customer_reviews.text: The seal sticker is broken before I even open it. And a whole wad of cream just stuck to the lid side, no seal. Is this how Desitin usually packages the tub version? I've been using the tube version, so I'm not sure. If so, I think adding a seal to the tub under the lid might be a good idea. Or maybe what I received is a returned product? Just checking.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Instant relief for sore bottoms.  A must for new parents.
customer_reviews.text: This is a must for every new parent. In raising three boys there was only one rash that couldn't be cleared up with desitin. I like to leave the tub in the nursery and use the toothpaste like tubes for the diaper bag. Depending on how sensitive your child's skin, this tub will last a long time. I've only had desitin go bad once, when I saved it from one baby to the next (three years apart) and the cream separated a little. I still use this cream on my older kids occasionally. If they get a rash from wet swimsuits, or a sore bottom from diarrhea this cream brings instant relief.
customer_reviews.author: Gretta

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: This cream always clears up the baby's bottom. The cream is thick so it lasts long, but that also means it requires some work to clean off. Wiping a bunch to clean is not always the best thing to do as it causes more issues, so I combine with some A&D ointment and it wipes off easily and still clears up the area
customer_reviews.author: Frank H. Gell III

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected! I've had deliveries from other sellers come with nearby expiration dates and that was thankfully not the case. No complaints! (Not sure why sheerness is a category for this review -that's never been a reason why I'd buy desitin - don't think it should discourage anyone from buying)
customer_reviews.author: Adry Sotolongo

customer_reviews.title: bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: Opened the container and there was separation of water and the cream....thought it was odd so stirred it and tried dumping the liquid out. Consistency is weird and there's water that separates from the cream so when you try to wipe it on baby's bottom, it won't stick to her skin!! So strange! Would return if I could or would really like my money back or a new one sent! Not sure if this was a bad batch or not even Desitin or if it was just really old and it separated. Can't even use it! So annoying!
customer_reviews.author: Yook Y. Fong

customer_reviews.title: I Recommend...
customer_reviews.text: Everything you would expect from a diaper rash cream! I used it with my babies and now they're using it on theirs and it's a great buy. I notice a lot of reviews said they had problems with leakage but mine was leak free. I'd recommend it and will be back for more when she needs it!
customer_reviews.author: Portia Silcox

customer_reviews.title: product arrived without a seal around the outside and no seal inside
customer_reviews.text: the product did not have any seal around the outside and did not have a seal on the inside. the lid was easily removable and as far as i could tell may have been used before i received it. this is a product meant for intimate areas; it should, at the very least, have had a seal around the outside and preferably a seal along the top on the inside (like ice-cream). i threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: margaret  b.

customer_reviews.title: Lives up-to the Desitin name!
customer_reviews.text: My pediatrician suggested me to get this after my baby got diaper rash. This has helped unexpectedly & I am already seeing the difference in just 2 days!! Will continue buying this over other brands. The inly thing is that it’s so thick that it a little difficult to wipe off when changing diaper but that could only mean it actually forms a barrier between baby’s mess & her skin.
customer_reviews.author: Saima

customer_reviews.title: Who knew that Desitin wasn't that good? Certainly not me
customer_reviews.text: Who knew that Desitin wasn't that good? Certainly not me... everyone uses it! Then my child would get these horrible rashes no matter how often I changed him. The daycare workers hinted to me that there were other products with much better, long lasting coverage than Desitin. Desitin is thin and once there is a rash it does nothing to help clear it up. Since switching from Desitin to Triple Paste I have seen a dramatic drop in rashes and don't need to use strong medications like Dr. Smith's nearly as often to get rid of pesky, lingering rashes.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Only cream we use
customer_reviews.text: This cream is amazing and fast. Like super fast on rashes. We live in Phoenix and babys and kids get plenty sweaty. Within an hour theres a noticable difference or its alnost completely gone.
customer_reviews.author: Spaghetti Hair

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging choice
customer_reviews.text: Like the product but the packaging of the tub is poor. Came with a piece of tape only that had been broken into pieces and stuck back on. Wasn't sealed at all. Not good choice for a baby skin product. Get the tubes instead
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: Best zinc product i have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST product for sensitive and fair skin. I sometimes use it on my feet to heal the rashes and also works as a good sunscreen specially at the beach! downside: it is difficult to spread it and makes skin look white ( good for fair skin tone)
customer_reviews.author: Maryam

customer_reviews.title: Bag Balm is a WAY better option
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't do anything for my baby. He screamed bloody murder everytime I changed his diaper, and the Desitin hasn't helped heal or relieve him. My mom suggested Bag Balm, and it has worked miracles! My baby is so content during diaper changes and the rash disappeared in two days.
customer_reviews.author: Casandra

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: Destin works to prevent rash ,bed sores and itch i have been paralized an bed ridden since jan 2017 my wife uses desitin on my back and bottom ..i have never had a rash or bed sore
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product but poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love using Destin for my boys.. good price and fast delivery but I was really concerned of the packaging... there was just a little piece of tape to keep it closed.. Was not sealed or anything
customer_reviews.author: The Bohls

customer_reviews.title: Effective diaper rash cream
customer_reviews.text: Desitin is best diaper cream. We are using it since my daughter is born. We apply this cream everyday and my daughter never have diaper rashes. The cream very smooth to spread and it does perfect job. I cant expect more results than this!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: The bottle is larger than expected, its gonna last months. Thick and easy to spread. This is more economical than the tubes. I will definitely buy again in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Liseli C.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT STUFF
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER RECOMMEND ANYTHING,BUT I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS . I USED IT ON MY KIDS .NOW I USE IT ON MY HORSES GREAT WOUND DRESSING. GOOD FOR ALL LITTLE BOO BOOS 1 KEPS FLYS AND GNATS AWAY
customer_reviews.author: thesewinglady

customer_reviews.title: Works just as well as the purple jar at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I started buying this version of Desitin because the regular 16oz container is not available in the brick and mortar stores and you have to pay $30 to buy it online. This works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Karen in NY

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Seems to last forever, has no scent and works great. I judge greatness on the fact that neither kiddo has ever had a diaper rash. I have this on an auto refill, but I think I’ve only ever gotten it 1X a year over the last few years & we use it nearly every day
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: No diaper rash since using it
customer_reviews.text: We only use this at night when we go long periods without changing our son's diaper. He hasn't had any diaper rash and he's 6 months old, so I'd say it's working. It is easy to spread and doesn't have a scent, which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: No protective seal.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit skeeved out. There was no protective seal on it. Shouldn't there be for products that are going to be put on sensitive skin, sores or ingested?
customer_reviews.author: Kubie Kat

customer_reviews.title: Bareable
customer_reviews.text: I was upset because it had a crack in in the lid which caused some desitin to come out but barely any. Otherwise, i wouldve gave a 5 star review, never had a problem with this brand & my daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: Jazzmeene Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Its alot of Desitin.
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt smell like destin so i was very iffy at first, but ive been using it for alittle while now and it paints my daughter just like desitin!!! Seems to still work very well for her! We use it as a preventative since my daughter is imobile and we havnt had any diaper rash.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Our baby seems to be susceptible to diaper rashes. We tried a few different things until we found this. This product has helped a lot and is a great value compared to another product we tried that was double the price. We use this every day.
customer_reviews.author: M Felix

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work as great as the purple but we purchased because this one was $5 cheaper to try out - definitely prefer the extra strength one that is purple over the blue but it’s not horrible would order again if price was discounted again
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and works as expected--I slather on a thick layer ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and works as expected--I slather on a thick layer at night before putting my LO to bed (sleeps ~11 hours without a diaper change so that's a long time that we need a barrier to protect her from wetness). Knock on wood, despite an episode of diarrhea and transitioning to solids, she hasn't had trouble with diaper rash yet!
customer_reviews.author: nybrownie

customer_reviews.title: Super gentle and healing
customer_reviews.text: Godsend for eczema. Super gentle and healing. My hyper sensitive skin flare-ups calm down immediately with this crazy jar of goodness. For some reason, this has a halting effect on the inflammation caused by eczema.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cheffy ⭐💖🌛Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: I'd give it my good for me rating of 4 stars for value
customer_reviews.text: It seems, none of these come "sealed" by the OEM. I went to the store directly and see all on the shelf, are not "sealed". That's a problem for me since for "me" and an infant. If "sealed", tamper resistent tape, etc. I'd give it my good for me rating of 4 stars for value, etc. But, I can't since is not sealed and will not use it like this, unsealed, no tamper resistance to show if even "a prior return"... --how would you know?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_User

customer_reviews.title: Better than the purple one
customer_reviews.text: Before I started to use this one I was using the purple one and my baby was still getting diaper rash. I been using this one now for two months and it works wonderful for my baby since I started using it My baby hasn’t get any rash.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Perez

customer_reviews.title: Works fast
customer_reviews.text: Our baby had redness from her diaper during the first weeks after birth. We tried vitamin D cream that was given by the hospital. That worked a little bit. Our friend recommended Desitin and within days of use, the redness went away. Now we use it pretty regularly and have no issues. With regular daily use, it's lasted us 6 months and there's still some left. I anticipate another month or so. We didn't try other brands because this one worked for us.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan R.

customer_reviews.title: As promised
customer_reviews.text: We were using the purple maximum strength Desitin and wanted a bigger bin. Maximum strength only comes in little tubes, so we got this. I don't think it works as quickly as the maximum strength, but definitely helps. Price seemed best on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Bitey (the big one)

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: There is no seal on the tub, and a whole wad of cream just stuck to the lid side. I think the tube version is better. I suggested that adding a seal to the tub under the lid might be a good idea. On the other hand, it’s so thick that it hard to smear uniformly and usually make a messy.
customer_reviews.author: TCC

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: First, this was NOT sealed when I got it which is very unsettling. Second, it stains the hell out of clothes. I accidentally got some on my shirt and had to throw my shirt away... I will never purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Cream
customer_reviews.text: Desitin is a TRIED & TRUE product. I have used it for years. Purchased and had it sent to my 96 year old Mom when she had a skin problem. She received it in two days and was quite thankful for the results
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and soothing
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the original formula! No strong smell, and it seems to soothe, rather than sting, my baby's bottom. Plus, it's less greasy than the original formula (we call it marshmallow fluff), and it slowly sinks to the bottom of the container on its own as you use it up, rather than sticking to the sides and getting all over your hand. I wish they had a flip-top lid, though. We popped the lid off an old container of butt paste to replace the metal screw-top lid, which is a pain in the middle of night.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Good amount and smooth to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Or son has very sensitive skin and this calms any rash that pops up. Wipes of hands easily, yet lasts on baby's diaper area till the next change.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. I've used this for 40 some years and it's good stuff. It's not just for diaper rash.
customer_reviews.author: JAMIE

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. 13 months and no eczema at all. When diarrhea strikes, change to the purple one and you will be good. I even use with myself sometimes to get better from running/cycling sores...
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Scofano Diniz

customer_reviews.title: Watch Out for it being opened!
customer_reviews.text: The last two times I have received this product there has not been a seal code, and it looks like someone’s fingers have scooped some out. Normally I wouldn’t post this, but it has happened the last TWO times.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Destin is my go to for rash cream. Works well and works fast. If it's not working take your baby to a doctor as it's probably yeast which this will not fix.
customer_reviews.author: Stormywaters

customer_reviews.title: Defence from skin problems
customer_reviews.text: This keeps me from chaffing and my skin rubbing together hurting, sweating and getting rashes.
customer_reviews.author: HUNYB777

customer_reviews.title: High quality, lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the fast acting diaper cream to the regular and this tub lasted us forever! Desitin is always high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Hava

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! I recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a over a month ago and I still have a generous amount of product left. It works really well and lasts a long time. My baby has not had a diaper rash since I bought this product.
customer_reviews.author: Renee T Huggins

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a bedridden adult and it cleared up her rash very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Melymel

customer_reviews.title: Not As Advertised, RAPID REPAIR
customer_reviews.text: A seller, as advertised; problem NOT product. Ad says Rapid Repair BUT.... received Daily Defense Why????? above, In Create Review it says - Desitin Daily Defense Baby Diaper Rash Cream with Zinc Oxide to Treat, Relieve & Prevent diaper rash, 16 oz HOWEVER in ad it says - Rapid Repair.
customer_reviews.author: No Name

customer_reviews.title: Works great on horses' legs for some things
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good on my horse's fetlocks/backs of heels for some early crud due to constant moisture or pre-scratches. Please note, this product does NOT treat bacterial/yeast/fungal infections but can help heal the skin in some cases.
customer_reviews.author: J. BushTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: It's a big jar that it could last for so long. I've purchased desitin tube form and it's a great product for diaper rash. Thus, I purchased the large size so I can use it for a longer time.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Best rash cream!
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than at Walmart!! I check all stores and Amani has the best price for this item, my son has very sensitive skin and iv even used breast milk for rashes and this stuff is by far the best next thing!! Heals fast!! You can even apply on body rash all around there body as well!
customer_reviews.author: Yariela

customer_reviews.title: Clears up and prevents diaper rash
customer_reviews.text: Our little one got diaper rash a couple weeks after birth. This cleared it up in a couple days. We occasionally use it as a preventative
customer_reviews.author: Dumac

customer_reviews.title: Favorite bootie cream
customer_reviews.text: Always our go to diaper cream. 3 kids down and tried literally almost everything out there and desitin is by far worked the best for our kids.
customer_reviews.author: TinyDino

customer_reviews.title: Great for candida breakout!
customer_reviews.text: I had tried other products for occasional candida, this works the best!
customer_reviews.author: Kime

customer_reviews.title: Good value, great sized container.
customer_reviews.text: Great barrier to keep diaper rash away. The large jar is economical & easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn H

customer_reviews.title: CHECK THE SEAL
customer_reviews.text: I usually order this every couple of months with no issues but this time the seal was broken and there were finger prints in the cream. They are replacing/shipping a new one for free but be sure to look it over when you receive it.
customer_reviews.author: LaurenJ

customer_reviews.title: Smart to buy
customer_reviews.text: Definitely great cost per ounce compared to the tube and lasts a lot longer obviously, but I wish it was a pop top, so I don’t need two hands. Especially now that I have a complete wiggle worm on my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my baby's bottom
customer_reviews.text: This is the only brand I will use on my daughter. I have been using this since she was in the NICU. The tub is the perfect size and lasts a pretty long time. I also buy the tube to keep in her diaper bag. Highly recommend this product :)
customer_reviews.author: Annika Navalta

customer_reviews.title: I love buying the tub for at home and for daycare
customer_reviews.text: I love buying the tub for at home and for daycare. I wish it had a flip top like another popular brand. I actually put the lid from the other brand on this container.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Fine for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Original barrier cream. It has 13% zinc oxide whereas purple label tube has 40%...so this will not stay put as well.
customer_reviews.author: BUCK

customer_reviews.title: It works and is doctor recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is what the doctor recommended and it cleared up his diaper rash in 24 hours. I bought a big tub and he hasn't needed it except for that one time, so I don't expect to need to buy more of this stuff. It's a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Moose on the loose

customer_reviews.title: Yikes!
customer_reviews.text: The farther I get into this cream, the worse it gets. The oil has separated from the cream and it doesn't spread easily on my baby's butt. Also, I've gotten down to some hard chips that have formed. I keep this stored at room temp, so I know it's not been out in the heat... I usually love desitin but I think I must have been sent a particularly old one
customer_reviews.author: Emily Duncan

customer_reviews.title: very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product We use it on every diaper change and so far he doesn't know what a diaper rash is
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Best skin protector
customer_reviews.text: I am on my back in rehab. The Desitin is saving my bottom from bedsores. Just a small amount is needed. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Arona K Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Quality is Suspect
customer_reviews.text: This arrived with just two small pieces of tape holding the lid to the container. Nothing about this product seemed "sanitary". We use this product all the time when bought from local stores, but they are always SEALED. I will not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Frank G.

customer_reviews.title: It works at reducing rash.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works really well, but can be messy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Luke & Ashley Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Great multi use product
customer_reviews.text: Great option for using on horse noses to keep their skin from getting sunburnt in the summer days.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good for diaper rash
customer_reviews.text: A little messy but worth it. So helpful with diaper rash
customer_reviews.author: Rachel P

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a jar and is very effective for baby rashes, heat rashes and any skin rashes I or my grandbabies have had!
customer_reviews.author: Helen K

customer_reviews.title: Safety seal on jar was broken. So can’t use on my baby obviously. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Safety seal on jar was broken. So can’t use on my baby obviously. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb K.

customer_reviews.title: Messy!
customer_reviews.text: I love desitin and this is a great size but it came really messy. Like the desitin kind of oozed over the rim and lid.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Bad idea
customer_reviews.text: Desitin works magic, but this tub is a bad idea! You need two hands to get it open and not make a mess, plus trying to manage a squirming baby. I’ll keep buying the tube version.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product/price
customer_reviews.text: We use it for 2 babies, very good agains rashes
customer_reviews.author: Pan-clu-la

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my niece. Her twins will be happy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my niece. Her twins will be happy.

customer_reviews.title: sad for this
customer_reviews.text: This product is good but I see the expire day at 3 months later

customer_reviews.title: The best cream ever! Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This cream works wonderful to prevent an improve diaper rash and burns.
customer_reviews.author: IVONNE ARDILA

customer_reviews.title: Container was open- but product is great
customer_reviews.text: Cobtainer was open when I received it. Everything in my package had cream on it. The desitin itself is great. I use it on my horses.
customer_reviews.author: S. May

customer_reviews.title: Good for preventing rashes
customer_reviews.text: I have been applying this cream onto DD after just about every diaper change to PREVENT diaper rashes from rearing its ugly head. It has been two months and so far, aside from an occasional redness when she has her 5-7hour stretch of sleep, there has been no rashes. Also, this jar is huge! I won't be surprised if this lasts me 6months+ even with several uses daily.
customer_reviews.author: xcuzm3

customer_reviews.title: open container
customer_reviews.text: this item it came open and spilled inside the shipping box. It was for my mother's home health care.Forced to dispose it
customer_reviews.author: jett320

customer_reviews.title: The tried and true original. Worked better for our twins than anything else.
customer_reviews.text: Frist, we tried a few other types of these products and honestly none of them worked near as good as the Desitin. Also, getting Desitin in the tub is definitely the way to go. At least for at your 'changing station'. It is so much more convenient to swipe your finger through the tub than it is to squeeze some out of a tube when you are dealing with limbs flying all over the place. We have it on subscribe and save now.
customer_reviews.author: pseudosavant

customer_reviews.title: Time tested best product at a great size
customer_reviews.text: Best product in a great size and container to avoid waste and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks like this was opened
customer_reviews.text: It looks like this was opened. No seal on it. I am scared to use it on my newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Perry

customer_reviews.title: Total diaper care and comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is the only way to go. Grocery store only sells smaller tubes and they cost much more per ounce. Knocks out any irritation or rash from diapers.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described, packaged well and arrived quickly. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, packaged well and arrived quickly. Thanks so much!

customer_reviews.title: It may be expired
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to review the expiry date on this item. The product was working just fine until I noticed it there was a constant watery substance settling at the top of the jar. This has changed the consistency of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Xoxo

customer_reviews.title: YES
customer_reviews.text: Good old desitin! Irked like a charm! Initially I bought the honest products- which made diaper rash worse/ this is the go to and works immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A WINNER
customer_reviews.text: EXCEPT FOR THE FACT THAT THE LID WAS OFF AND I WAS ONLY ABLE TO SAVE HALF OF YOUR PRODUCT. OTHERS THAT I HAD RECEIVED HAVE BEEN GREAT AND THE LID WAS SCREWED ON TIGHT

customer_reviews.title: Nice Size!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size it will last a few months and I use for almost every diaper change. It has really helped to prevent diaper rashes. No need to apply too much.
customer_reviews.author: Maryam

product_meta.title: Desitin Daily Defense Baby Diaper Rash Cream with Zinc Oxide to Treat, Relieve & Prevent diaper rash, Hypoallergenic, Dye-, Phthalate- & Paraben-Free, 16 oz
product_meta.description: Size:16 Ounce (Pack of 1)Use Desitin Daily Defense Diaper Rash Cream every day to soothe, treat and prevent diaper rash. This hypoallergenic and Pediatrician-tested formula instantly forms a protective barrier on your baby's tender skin and is clinically shown to provide diaper rash relief. It is designed to work at the first hint of diaper rash to help heal and soothe your baby's skin. Made with fast-acting zinc oxide formula, this diaper cream helps seal out wetness and provides protection from the first use. It is dermatologist-tested and free of parabens, phthalates, and dyes, so it's gentle enough to use at every diaper change. The creamy formula goes on smoothly and wipes off easily, making Desitin Daily Defense Diaper Rash Cream your trusted partner for treating diaper rash from the first signs.
feature_bullets: Made with zinc oxide, its fast-acting hypoallergenic formula helps seal out wetness to treat diaper rash from the first signs and is clinically shown to provide diaper rash relief. This diaper cream is specially formulated for babies' tender skin and is paraben-, phthalate- and dye-free so it's gentle enough to use at every diaper change. Its creamy formula goes on smoothly and wipes off easily, making Desitin Daily Defense Diaper Rash Cream your trusted partner for treating diaper rash from the first signs

specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
